channel.title: Autorestarter help!
channel.description:
i found this code on some website and i tried it works fine but the thing is when i run it after the time it is given it opens a new server run.bat like it dosent close the one that are already running!
@echo off title .:server restarter:. :start set time=6000 start run.bat :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds. echo Restart in %time% Seconds Which is %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start
can some one help me please edit this code so it closes the server run.bat before it opens another one!

item.title: Autorestarter help!
item.dc:creator: @bl00dpk bl00dpk
item.description:
@bl00dpk wrote:

i found this code on some website and i tried it works fine but the thing is when i run it after the time it is given it opens a new server run.bat like it dosent close the one that are already running!

@echo off
title .:server restarter:.
:start
set time=6000
start run.bat
:loop
cls
IF %time% GTR 0 (
set /a time=%time% - 1
set /a min=%time%/60
echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds.
echo Restart in %time% Seconds Which is %min% Minutes.
ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL
goto loop
)
taskkill /f /im java.exe
cls
goto start

can some one help me please edit this code so it closes the server run.bat before it opens another one!

Read full topic
